main event: A witness observed a mysterious object resembling a star that suddenly went straight up and down before disappearing after about 5 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on May 5, 1964., The object was reported to be white and red-orange in color., The observer thought it was a star before it moved., The object was spotted at a northwest direction at a 45-degree elevation., The conclusion by investigators was that it was likely a balloon.
sighted object: a mysterious object resembling a star
